verses.verse: <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> took up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
"Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I were as in the <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when <S%H433>God<s%> watched over <S%H8104>me;<s%>
when his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H1984>shone<s%> on my <S%H7218>head,<s%> and by his <S%H216>light<s%> I <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H2822>darkness,<s%>
as I was in the <S%H2779>ripeness<s%> of my <S%H3117>days,<s%> when the <S%H5475>friendship<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> was in my <S%H168>tent,<s%>
when the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> was yet with <S%H5288>me,<s%> and my children were around <S%H5439>me,<s%>
when my <S%H1978>steps<s%> were <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H2529>butter,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> poured <S%H6694>out<s%> <S%H6388>streams<s%> of oil for <S%H8081>me,<s%>
when I went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H7176>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> when I <S%H3559>prepared<s%> my <S%H4186>seat<s%> in the <S%H7339>street.<s%>
The young <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> me and <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H3453>themselves.<s%> The aged rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5975>stood.<s%>
The <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H6113>refrained<s%> from <S%H4405>talking,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> their <S%H3709>hand<s%> on their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
The <S%H2244>voice<s%> of the <S%H5057>nobles<s%> was <S%H6963>hushed,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stuck<s%> to the roof of their <S%H2441>mouth.<s%>
For when the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H833>me,<s%> then it blessed <S%H5869>me;<s%> and when the eye <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5749>me,<s%> it commended me:
Because I <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> who <S%H7768>cried,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> <S%H5826>also,<s%> who had none to help him,
the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of him who was ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> on <S%H490>me,<s%> and I caused the widow's <S%H3820>heart<s%> to sing for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>
I <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and it <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H4941>me.<s%> My justice was as a <S%H4598>robe<s%> and a <S%H6797>diadem.<s%>
I was <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> and <S%H7272>feet<s%> to the <S%H6455>lame.<s%>
I was a <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H34>needy.<s%> The <S%H7379>cause<s%> of him who I <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, I searched <S%H2713>out.<s%>
I <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H4973>jaws<s%> of the <S%H5767>unrighteous,<s%> and <S%H7993>plucked<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> out of his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1478><s%> 'I shall die in my own <S%H7064>house,<s%> I shall <S%H7235>number<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>
My <S%H8328>root<s%> is spread <S%H6605>out<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters.<s%> The <S%H2919>dew<s%> lies all <S%H3885>night<s%> on my <S%H7105>branch.<s%>
My <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H2319>fresh<s%> in <S%H5978>me.<s%> My <S%H7198>bow<s%> is <S%H2498>renewed<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>'
"Men listened to <S%H3176>me,<s%> waited, and kept <S%H1826>silence<s%> <S%H3926>for<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> they <S%H8138>didn't<s%> speak again. My <S%H4405>speech<s%> fell on <S%H5197>them.<s%>
They <S%H3176>waited<s%> for me as for the <S%H4306>rain.<s%> Their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H6473>drank<s%> as with the spring <S%H4456>rain.<s%>
I <S%H7832>smiled<s%> on them when they had no <S%H539>confidence.<s%> They <S%H5307>didn't<s%> reject the <S%H216>light<s%> of my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

I <S%H977>chose<s%> out their <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> as <S%H7218>chief.<s%> I <S%H7931>lived<s%> as a <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H1416>army,<s%> as one who <S%H5162>comforts<s%> the <S%H57>mourners.<s%>
